name: SCNActionTimingMode
desc: Constants affecting the animation curve of an action, used by the timingMode property.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: Linear pacing. The animation progresses evenly throughout its duration.

items.name: case easeIn
items.desc: Ease-in pacing. The animation begins slowly, and then speeds up as it progresses.

items.name: case easeOut
items.desc: Ease-out pacing. The animation begins quickly, and then slows as it completes.

items.name: case easeInEaseOut
items.desc: Ease-in ease-out pacing. The animation begins slowly, accelerates through the middle of its duration, and then slows again before completing.
